prompt: Image Prompt: "Create an ethereal and symbolic representation of the Holy Trinity in Christian theology. Visualize a scene where three distinct yet interconnected divine figures – Father, Son, and Holy Spirit – are depicted in a harmonious and divine light. Each figure should embody unique characteristics while emanating a sense of unity and divine presence. The setting should convey a sense of transcendence and spiritual significance, evoking the mystery and majesty of the Triune God."
